de.javasoft.swing.table
Class AbstractTableCellRenderer<T extends javax.swing.JComponent>

java.lang.Object

                  de.javasoft.swing.table.AbstractTableCellRenderer<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Component type, used as renderer.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants, javax.swing.table.TableCellRenderer
Direct Known Subclasses:
CheckBoxTableCellRenderer, ComboBoxTableCellRenderer, DateComboBoxTableCellRenderer, HyperlinkTableCellRenderer, IntegerGroupTableCellRenderer, JYComboBoxTableCellRenderer, MultiLineTableCellRenderer, SliderTableCellRenderer, SpinnerTableCellRenderer, TextFieldTableCellRenderer
public abstract class AbstractTableCellRenderer<T extends javax.swing.JComponent>
extends javax.swing.JLabel
implements javax.swing.table.TableCellRenderer

Base component renderer for table cells. Note: The renderer is intended to be used with small or mid size tables. By applying the renderer to large tables the table performance can be affected. In case that performance is most important, it's not recommended to replace the default renderer with this kind of renderer.

The renderer renders a given value by the specified component class, which means some parts of the component (i.e arrow buttons) possibly appear within the table cell, which indicates that the value is editable.

Version:
1.01, 19.08.2010
See Also:
AbstractTableCellEditor, Serialized Form
